des: "A quick and healthy single-serving breakfast cup with no added sugar. A fiber, potassium, and protein-packed easy breakfast, great with your morning coffee."
ins: Mash banana in a microwave-safe mug. Add oats, almond butter, raisins, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and nutmeg to the mug; mix well to combine. Heat in microwave on high until cooked through, about 1 minute.
